featured.text: Also, drinking a lot of liquid in one go can cause more water to 29 the body quickly and come out as urine.
To 23 things out, the body will get rid of water by producing urine.

definition.zh_def: 尿液；由腎臟產生並通過尿道排出體外的液體廢物。
definition.en_def: A liquid waste product produced by the kidneys and excreted through the urinary tract.
definition.example: The doctor asked for a urine sample to test for any abnormalities.
